qa_pairs.question: What are the business hours?
qa_pairs.answer: Our business hours are Monday through Friday from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM Eastern Time. We are closed on weekends and major holidays.

qa_pairs.question: How do I reset my password?
qa_pairs.answer: To reset your password, visit the login page and click on the 'Forgot Password' link. Enter your email address, and we'll send you instructions to create a new password.

qa_pairs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
qa_pairs.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers. For enterprise customers, we also offer invoice-based payments with net-30 terms.

qa_pairs.question: How can I contact customer support?
qa_pairs.answer: You can reach our customer support team through multiple channels: Email us at support@example.com, call us at 1-800-123-4567, or use the live chat feature on our website during business hours.

qa_pairs.question: What is your refund policy?
qa_pairs.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all our products. If you're not satisfied with your purchase, contact our support team within 30 days of purchase for a full refund. Refunds typically process within 5-7 business days.
